112.content:
The room is dark and small, lit only by faint candles as Jennifer is ordered to approach the wooden table in the middle of the room.

“You requested to see me?” Jennifer asks, her face hidden by the hood of her dark brown robe.

“Yes,” the robed man sitting at the table, “your experience in this secret society has been fruitful?”

“It has, my leader.” She responds.

“I’m glad to hear it,” the man says, “because the time has come for you to serve us in our ritualistic sacrifice towards our idols of Mars and Venus.”

“The process where once every thousand years we symbolize the delivery of a servant from Mars to Venus to keep peace within the universe?”

“That’s it,” the man said, “the tale of Yuppa. Royalty that was imprisoned and shipped out to Venus to love the rest of his days as their lowly servant. It’s this ritual that eliminates any hazards from our community from attaining our desires.”

“That’s quite a responsibility to place on me,” Jennifer said, “are you sure I can do it?”

“Are you second guessing me?”

“I would never, my guide“

“Good, I have the utmost faith that you’ll be able to succeed with this. We have your target. We think it’s someone you know...”

151.content:
You smile at your reflection in the mirror as you straightened your tie. It was the same one you wore in the Time Magazine cover photoshoot a few months back.

You walk back into the master bedroom and saw your wife Dana still sleeping on your bed. Her long blonde hair was a mess. You thought about waking her, but you decided it wasn’t really worth your time. You didn’t marry her for conversation, but for that smoking body of her.

You walked through your mansion. As you were leaving the kitchen, you found one of your maids (you had no idea of her name. She was the younger Hispanic one) and gave her a firm slap on her ass. She gave a startled yelp, which made you laughed.

The girl turned to you and said something in Spanish.

“You have a problem?” You say as intimidating as you can.

“No! No Mr.Black!” She says quickly hoping to not risk losing her job.

“Good.” You answer not even looking at her as you head to your garage. You looked over your collection of cars and decide to go with the Red Ferrari today.

You are Tom Black, owner of Black Inc. You are one of America’s greatest success stories. A college dropout, who helped found a small tech start up, and lead it to becoming one of the world biggest and richest. You are a household name, who have used your money and technology to make the world a better place. You are considered the greatest mind of your generation.

What most people don’t know, is the fact that your best friend Nick Norton was actually the brains behind the company whose inventions made it successful, but you knew that he was going to no longer need you after awhile so you blackmailed him into giving over the entire company over to you.

After that you hired a team of investors to work for your company, but through your legal team you made it so all their works are put under your name.

Anyone who has tried to interfere with your success usually find themselves blackmailed, discredited, or even died.

You arrived at Black inc. headquarters parking garage, and walked to your private elevator. You pass your security team who after seeing you arrive immediately start to kiss up to you. You smile and think “It’s good to be the king.” as enter the elevator and head to your office.

When you reach the top floor you step out and walk down the long hallway which is decorated by “your” inventions.

At the end of the hall is your secretary’s office, and sitting at the desk in the middle of the room is Miss Akie Yamamoto. Akie is the daughter of a former tech rival from Japan who you blackmail into selling his company over to you. Apart of the deal was that his daughter would have to move to America and join your staff, and now you make this young investor work only as your private secretary.

“Good morning Mr.Black. Security has called that your 9 o’clock appointment has arrived.” Akie says as she hands you your coffee. She makes sure not to meet your eyes. You take the drink without saying a word and enter into your office.

You walk to your desk and take a seat. You sip your coffee. “Yes it is truly great to be king.” You say to yourself.

1541.content:
Your name was Devin and you were getting pretty tired of being single. Now don't get me wrong you really enjoyed being single. You loved going to the bars and picking up chicks but the one night stands were starting to get old. You were wanting something a little more serious. The player lifestyle was a young mans game and you were 31 and you were the last of your friends who were still single. One day you received an email from the streaming service Showflix. You clicked on it and were surprised that you won a spot on the new upcoming reality dating show called "Dating Blind". You read more into it and apparently this show took 8 women and put them in a house and they would be going on dates with men in search of finding the "one". The men were staying in another house and would only be able to talk to the women through a screen. For the men the point of the games was to get a women to say yes to their proposal. The women had to get the men to propose. After reading more you learned that the house was one of those new auto houses. It was built to serve either men or woman and make sure they were always taken care of. This sounded amazing but you were confused you never entered to be on this game show. You then spot another email from your sister.

" Hey Devin,

Please don't hate me but I entered you into a contest to be on a dating game, and you won! All you have to do is go to the house and meet the love of your life. I know this is sudden but I know how sad you have been being alone and I thought this could really work. I hope you give it a try.

Love,

Janet"

Of course it was Janet. She always hated your single lifestyle. That was probably because you slept with most of her friends. She was right though what could it hurt. The next morning you got in your car and drove to the address on the email.

You pulled up to see two beautiful mansions. One was painted white and purple and the other house was painted white and blue. You showed your admission letter to a guard at the gate and he directed you to park on the purple side. You get out of your car. This was so weird you thought to yourself as you walked up the steps. The email said that clothes would be provided so you had no luggage. You walked through the front doors and followed the signs with your name on it until you found your room. Why was your name written in pink. Once you walked in the door behind you closed and locked. You heard a famine voice coming from a speaker somewhere in the room.

"Welcome Devin! You are one of the first contestants on "Love is Blind". Before we get started you have to get ready to meet the other brides!" Other brides? you thought you wouldn't meet your bride till after you proposed. " After you get undressed we will provide a full makeover to make sure you look your best. Then you will be provided with a new set of clothes. Your suitors may not be able to see your face but as the show progresses you will have opportunities to send your new Beaus seductive images and even more" OH No! what is happening " Now lets get you ready to meet the man of your dreams."

"I am going to kill my sister. "You think to yourself.

info.brief_description: Stories about powerful men/boys being manipulated and bullied into becoming sexy women.
info.description:
Here is my first venture into writing my own material. These are going to be a collection of stories where powerful guys (CEO's, rich jerks, high school athletes,ect) are turned into the very women they felt entitled to. They are forced and tricked into prancing, strutting, and preening while they do all things girly and slutty. How will these once dominate men cope with having to flirt with men they once viewed as peers while the people who put them their watch on.

A few rules- No bathroom play or skat. light bondage is OK as long as it its not the main point. No children or baby chapter. Finally please make all chapters contribute to the ongoing story, if there is a "no, then what?" type chapters I will remove them.

Please enjoy.
